title: First Look: Festka Spectre GRVL Race Bike is All-Road Leaning for Outright Speed
content:
Michael Moureƒçek introduces the Festka Spectre Gravel, his distillation of a fast gravel race bike with, to no one's surprise, a stiffness inspired by the Spectre Road bike for the most direct pedal to propulsion ride feel

Read the full article at First Look: Festka Spectre GRVL Race Bike is All-Road Leaning for Outright Speed on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
